hero.title: Build together a
hero.lead: RealToken DAO is a decentralized ecosystem that integrates all your real-world asset tokens such as real estate, factoring, or debt, by collaborating with different partners to decentralize the management of real-world assets.

about.title: Real asset tokenization: liquidity, exchange, available, accessible.
about.description: RealToken DAO transforms real estate investment by making real assets accessible, tradable and available 24/7. Each token represents a verifiable share of a premium real estate portfolio, with instant liquidity and decentralized governance.

liquidity.title: Liquidity
liquidity.description: Access tokenized real estate assets tradable 24/7 on decentralized markets.

exchange.title: Exchange
exchange.description: Trade your RealToken tokens transparently and securely on the ecosystem.

available.title: Available
available.description: Real assets accessible to all, fractionalized into verifiable digital shares.

accessible.title: Accessible
accessible.description: Invest in premium real estate without traditional barriers or intermediaries.

rmm.title: RMM

yam.title: YAM
yam.description: Your Asset Manager - Management interface to track your tokenized assets, visualize returns and manage your RealToken portfolio.

tally.title: Tally (vote)

process.title: Join the RealToken ecosystem in three steps.

step1.title: Buy tokens from a partner
step1.text: Acquire your RealToken tokens from our certified partners and join the ecosystem.

step2.title: Tokens available in the ecosystem (RMM, YAM)
step2.text: Your tokens are immediately available on RMM for trading and YAM for portfolio management.

step3.title: Get a REG token and participate in governance
step3.text: Receive your REG tokens to actively participate in decentralized governance. Coming soon: NFTs to improve decentralized governance.

cta.title: Integrate your token and shape the future of the RealToken ecosystem.
cta.description: Join the RealToken ecosystem as a partner. Integrate your tokens and benefit from the liquidity, governance and DAO infrastructure to develop your project.

comite.pageDescription: The DAO is organized into committees to progressively delegate responsibilities to the community.

proposer.title: Proposer
proposer.description: To help establish: proposals on the Forum and corresponding votes on Tally (onChain).

security.title: Security Committee
security.description: To ensure the security of the DAO protocols (at minimum, intervene in emergencies to stop a protocol).

votingPower.title: Voting Power Working Group
votingPower.description: To study and propose new versions of the Voting Power calculation algorithm based on REG holdings.
votingPower.members: Taodiem, Paul, PhilP, Yohann76, Eric, Battistu, DRKTT, Stouban, Teugos

liquidity.title: Liquidity Management Committee
liquidity.description: To manage the liquidity strategy implemented via RIP00003, and to study and propose new liquidity management strategies.

marketing.title: Marketing and Communication Committee
marketing.description: To study and propose marketing and communication actions to increase visibility and engagement within the Realtoken ecosystem.

faq.pageDescription: Find answers to the most common questions about the RealToken ecosystem.

q1.question: What is the RealToken DAO?
q1.answer: The RealToken DAO is a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) dedicated to the tokenization of real-world assets (RWA), such as real estate but also art or infrastructure. It allows its members to participate in governance, invest in fractional assets, and contribute to a transparent and decentralized ecosystem.

q2.question: What is the link between RealToken and RealT?
q2.answer: RealToken and RealT share a common ecosystem focused on real asset tokenization. RealT focuses on creating and managing tokens (e.g. real estate tokens), while the RealToken DAO enables token holders to participate in governance and vote on key decisions (e.g. new projects, fund allocations).

q3.question: How can I participate in the DAO?
q3.answer:
To participate you need to:
• Hold governance tokens (e.g. RMM, or a RealToken-specific token).
• Connect to the voting platform (Tally) with a compatible wallet (MetaMask, WalletConnect, Rabby, etc.).
• Vote or propose ideas via the forum.

q4.question: What is an RWA (Real World Asset)?
q4.answer:
An RWA is a real-world asset (e.g. an apartment, a work of art) represented as a token on a blockchain. This allows:
• Fractional ownership (e.g. buying 10% of a building).
• Easier trading (24/7 liquidity).
• Automated management (rent, dividends) via smart contracts.

q5.question: How are decisions made in the DAO?
q5.answer:
Decisions are made through a decentralized voting process:
• A member submits a proposal.
• The community discusses on the forum and finalizes the proposal.
• The vote is created on Tally.
• REG token holders vote.
• The proposal is implemented if the quorum is reached.

q6.question: What are the risks associated with RWA and the DAO?
q6.answer:
• Volatility: token values can fluctuate.
• Regulation: legal frameworks evolve (e.g. tax, compliance).
• Technology: bugs in smart contracts (hence the importance of audits).
• Governance: risk of concentration of power if a few members hold many tokens.
• Advice: diversify your investments and follow DAO updates.

q7.question: How can I propose a project or idea to the DAO?
q7.answer:
• Join the forum.
• Write a proposal with: a clear title; a detailed description (objectives, budget, timeline). See the template.
• Submit the proposal for a vote via Tally.

q8.question: Where can I find help or ask questions?
q8.answer: Telegram, Forum, FAQ, and by email if available.

q9.question: Is the DAO open to crypto beginners?
q9.answer: Yes! RealToken aims to democratize access to RWA. Resources are available: beginner's guide (blog articles), community (experienced members help newcomers on Telegram).
